meanings.definition: A surgical operation in which a part of the colon is incised.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed a colotomy to remove the blockage in the colon.
meanings.sent2: After the colotomy, the patient's digestive system started functioning better.
meanings.sent3: During the colotomy, the colon whispered jokes to the surgeon.
meanings.sent4: The colotomy was like opening a secret passage in the body.
meanings.sent5: The colotomy revealed the inner workings of the colon like a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: The incision made in a colotomy.
meanings.sent1: The nurse carefully monitored the healing of the colotomy incision.
meanings.sent2: The colotomy incision required regular dressing changes.
meanings.sent3: The colotomy incision seemed to have a mind of its own, healing rapidly.
meanings.sent4: The colotomy incision was a gateway to recovery for the patient.
meanings.sent5: The precise cut of the colotomy incision amazed the medical team.
